Nightlithg::

"This is Nightlight" Nightlight answered the comm link "Windlord is 
still in the cr... I'll go to help you to bring the pod"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., rauq@t... wrote:
> OOC: about as much as Axis was doing eh. =P
> 
> --- Axis / Lokk ---
> 
> Lokk approaches, "Don't bother, we'll drag it back." He seals the 
> pod, then opens a commlink to the Chivitron base, "Windlord, This 
is 
> Lokk. We've arrived at the site of the pod that landed, but there's 
> nobody here. I think that we should bring the pod back, and 
possibly 
> use it for spare parts." Lokk waits for Windlord's response.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > ::Grounded/Seekker::
> > Grounded not knowing where he had been walks out of the 
> > bridge.  "What's going on over here?"
> > 
> > Seekker " haha weakling Axis....let the big guns go at it"....he 
> > walks over and the tiny bot grips the pod and with one heroic 
feat 
> of 
> > strength....does nothing.
